00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
00037 #pragma warning ( disable : 4786 )
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include <iostream>
00041 #include <string>
00042 
00043 #include "itkImage.h"
00044 #include "itkVectorImage.h"
00045 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00046 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00047 #include "itkImageRegionIteratorWithIndex.h"
00048 #include "btkNiftiFilenameRadix.h"
00049 
00050 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00051 
00052 int main( int argc, char * argv[] )
00053 {
00054   try{
00055 
00056   // Parse arguments
00057 
00058   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Converts a dwi sequence in nifti format to nrrd format", ' ', "Unversioned");
00059 
00060   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Diffusion-weighted sequence",true,"","string",cmd);
00061   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outputArg("o","output","Sequence in NRRD format",true,"","string",cmd);
00062 
00063   TCLAP::SwitchArg  lsssSwitchArg("v","vectorImage","The output is volume interleaved (an image of "
00064   "vectors of diffusion values). By default, the output is voxel interleaved (you go through the "
00065   "DWI values for each voxel before moving on to the values for the next voxel). ",cmd,false);
00066 
00067   TCLAP::SwitchArg  lpsSwitchArg("","lps","Word coordinates expressed in LPS (Left-Posterior-Superior). "
00068   "By default RAS (Right-Anterior-Superior) is used.",cmd,false);
00069 
00070   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00071 
00072   std::string inputFileStr;
00073   inputFileStr = inputArg.getValue();
00074   const char* inputFile = inputFileStr.c_str();
00075 
00076   std::string bvecFileStr;
00077   bvecFileStr = btk::GetRadixOf(inputFileStr);
00078   bvecFileStr = bvecFileStr + ".bvec";
00079   const char* bvecFile = bvecFileStr.c_str();
00080 
00081   std::string bvalFileStr;
00082   bvalFileStr = btk::GetRadixOf(inputFileStr);
00083   bvalFileStr = bvalFileStr + ".bval";
00084   const char* bvalFile = bvalFileStr.c_str();
00085 
00086   const char* outputFile = outputArg.getValue().c_str();
00087 
00088   std::string rawFile = outputArg.getValue();
00089   rawFile.replace(rawFile.size()-4,7,"raw.gz");
00090 
00091   // Read dwi sequence
00092 
00093   typedef short         PixelType;
00094   const   unsigned int  Dimension = 4;
00095 
00096   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >   ImageType;
00097   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType >    ReaderType;
00098 
00099   ReaderType::Pointer reader = ReaderType::New();
00100 
00101   reader -> SetFileName( inputFile );
00102   reader -> Update();
00103 
00104   ImageType::Pointer image = reader -> GetOutput();
00105 
00106   ImageType::SizeType       imageSize       = image -> GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize();
00107   ImageType::PointType      imageOrigin     = image -> GetOrigin();
00108   ImageType::SpacingType    imageSpacing    = image -> GetSpacing();
00109   ImageType::DirectionType  imageDirection  = image -> GetDirection();
00110 
00111 // Read b-values
00112 
00113   std::vector< int > bValues;
00114   std :: cout << "Reading bvalues from "  << bvalFile << std::endl; std::cout.flush();
00115 
00116   FILE* f;
00117 
00118   f = fopen( bvalFile, "r" );
00119   int bvalue;
00120   while ( !feof(f) )
00121   {
00122     fscanf( f, "%d ", &bvalue);
00123     bValues.push_back(bvalue);
00124   }
00125   fclose (f);
00126 
00127 // Read gradients
00128 
00129   std::vector< std::vector< float > > gValues(3);
00130 
00131   std :: cout << "Reading gradients from " << bvecFile << std::endl; std::cout.flush();
00132 
00133   f = fopen( bvecFile, "r" );
00134   float gvalue;
00135   int coor = 0;
00136   for (unsigned int i=1; i<=3*bValues.size(); i++)
00137   {
00138     if ( ( i % bValues.size() ) == 0 )
00139       fscanf( f, "%f\n", &gvalue);
00140     else
00141       fscanf( f, "%f ", &gvalue);
00142 
00143     gValues[coor].push_back(gvalue);
00144 
00145     if ( ( i % bValues.size() ) == 0 )
00146       coor++;
00147   }
00148   fclose (f);
00149 
00150 
00151   if (lsssSwitchArg.isSet())
00152   {
00153 
00154   // Create vector image
00155 
00156     typedef itk::VectorImage< PixelType, 3 >   VectorImageType;
00157     VectorImageType::Pointer nrrdImage = VectorImageType::New();
00158     nrrdImage -> SetVectorLength( bValues.size() );
00159 
00160     VectorImageType::IndexType  start;
00161     VectorImageType::SizeType   size;
00162     VectorImageType::RegionType region;
00163 
00164     start[0] = 0; start[1] = 0; start[2] = 0;
00165     size[0]  = imageSize[0];  size[1]  = imageSize[1];  size[2]  = imageSize[2];
00166 
00167     region.SetSize( size );
00168     region.SetIndex( start );
00169 
00170     nrrdImage -> SetRegions( region );
00171     nrrdImage -> Allocate();
00172 
00173 
00174     // Fill vector image
00175 
00176     typedef itk::ImageRegionIteratorWithIndex< VectorImageType >  IteratorType;
00177     IteratorType nrrdIt( nrrdImage, nrrdImage -> GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
00178 
00179     VectorImageType::IndexType nrrdIndex;
00180     VectorImageType::PixelType nrrdPixel;
00181     ImageType::IndexType niftiIndex;
00182 
00183     for( nrrdIt.GoToBegin(); !nrrdIt.IsAtEnd(); ++nrrdIt)
00184     {
00185       nrrdIndex = nrrdIt.GetIndex();
00186       nrrdPixel = nrrdIt.Get();
00187 
00188       niftiIndex[0] = nrrdIndex[0]; niftiIndex[1] = nrrdIndex[1]; niftiIndex[2] = nrrdIndex[2];
00189 
00190       for ( unsigned int k=0; k < nrrdImage -> GetVectorLength(); k++)
00191       {
00192         niftiIndex[3] = k;
00193         nrrdPixel[k] = image -> GetPixel( niftiIndex );
00194 
00195       }
00196 
00197       nrrdIt.Set( nrrdPixel );
00198 
00199     }
00200 
00201     // Write binary data
00202     // TODO How to compress data? NrrdIO option?
00203 
00204     typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< VectorImageType > WriterType;
00205     WriterType::Pointer writer = WriterType::New();
00206 
00207     writer -> SetInput( nrrdImage );
00208     writer -> SetFileName( outputFile );
00209     writer -> UseCompressionOn();
00210     writer -> Update();
00211 
00212   }
00213   else
00214   {
00215     // Write binary data
00216     // TODO How to compress data? NrrdIO option?
00217 
00218     typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType > WriterType;
00219     WriterType::Pointer writer = WriterType::New();
00220 
00221     writer -> SetInput( image );
00222     writer -> SetFileName( outputFile );
00223     writer -> UseCompressionOn();
00224     writer -> Update();
00225 
00226   }
00227 
00228   // Write header
00229 
00230   FILE* fw;
00231   fw = fopen( outputFile, "w" );
00232   fprintf( fw, "NRRD0005\n" );
00233 
00234   char* pch;
00235   char* rawFile_cstr = (char*)rawFile.c_str();;
00236 
00237   pch = strtok(rawFile_cstr,"/");
00238   while (pch != NULL)
00239   {
00240     rawFile_cstr = pch;
00241     pch = strtok (NULL, "/");
00242   }
00243 
00244   fprintf( fw, "content: exists(%s,0)\n",rawFile_cstr);
00245   fprintf( fw, "type: short\n");
00246   fprintf( fw, "dimension: 4\n");
00247   //TODO How to change space? NrrdIO option?
00248   if ( lpsSwitchArg.isSet() )
00249     fprintf( fw, "space: left-posterior-superior\n");
00250   else
00251     fprintf( fw, "space: right-anterior-superior\n");
00252 
00253   if (lsssSwitchArg.isSet())
00254     fprintf( fw, "sizes: %ld %ld %ld %ld\n", imageSize[3], imageSize[0], imageSize[1], imageSize[2]);
00255   else
00256     fprintf( fw, "sizes: %ld %ld %ld %ld\n", imageSize[0], imageSize[1], imageSize[2], imageSize[3]);
00257 
00258   fprintf( fw, "thicknesses: NaN NaN %lf NaN\n", imageSpacing[2]);
00259 
00260   vnl_matrix<double> niftiDir;
00261   niftiDir = imageDirection.GetVnlMatrix();
00262 
00263   vnl_matrix<double> nrrdDir;
00264   nrrdDir = niftiDir.extract(3,3);
00265 
00266   if ( !lpsSwitchArg.isSet() )
00267   {
00268     nrrdDir.scale_row(0,-1);
00269     nrrdDir.scale_row(1,-1);
00270   }
00271 
00272   vnl_matrix<double> nrrdSpa(3,3);
00273   nrrdSpa.set_identity();
00274   nrrdSpa(0,0) = imageSpacing[0]; nrrdSpa(1,1) = imageSpacing[1]; nrrdSpa(2,2) = imageSpacing[2];
00275 
00276   vnl_matrix<double> nrrdSpaDir;
00277   nrrdSpaDir = nrrdDir * nrrdSpa;
00278 
00279   if (lsssSwitchArg.isSet())
00280     fprintf( fw, "space directions: none (%lf,%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf,%lf)\n",
00281            nrrdSpaDir(0,0), nrrdSpaDir(1,0), nrrdSpaDir(2,0),
00282            nrrdSpaDir(0,1), nrrdSpaDir(1,1), nrrdSpaDir(2,1),
00283            nrrdSpaDir(0,2), nrrdSpaDir(1,2), nrrdSpaDir(2,2) );
00284   else
00285     fprintf( fw, "space directions: (%lf,%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf,%lf) none\n",
00286            nrrdSpaDir(0,0), nrrdSpaDir(1,0), nrrdSpaDir(2,0),
00287            nrrdSpaDir(0,1), nrrdSpaDir(1,1), nrrdSpaDir(2,1),
00288            nrrdSpaDir(0,2), nrrdSpaDir(1,2), nrrdSpaDir(2,2) );
00289 
00290 
00291   fprintf( fw, "centerings: cell cell cell ???\n");
00292 
00293   if (lsssSwitchArg.isSet())
00294     fprintf( fw, "kinds: list space space space\n");
00295   else
00296     fprintf( fw, "kinds: space space space list\n");
00297 
00298   fprintf( fw, "endian: little\n");
00299   fprintf( fw, "encoding: gzip\n");
00300   fprintf( fw, "space units: \"mm\" \"mm\" \"mm\"\n");
00301 
00302   if ( lpsSwitchArg.isSet() )
00303     fprintf( fw, "space origin: (%lf,%lf,%lf)\n", imageOrigin[0], imageOrigin[1], imageOrigin[2]);
00304   else
00305     fprintf( fw, "space origin: (%lf,%lf,%lf)\n", -imageOrigin[0], -imageOrigin[1], imageOrigin[2]);
00306 
00307   fprintf( fw, "data file: %s\n",rawFile_cstr);
00308   fprintf( fw, "measurement frame: (1,0,0) (0,1,0) (0,0,1)\n");
00309   fprintf( fw, "modality:=DWMRI\n");
00310 
00311   // Express gradient directions in WC
00312 
00313   vnl_vector< double > g(3);
00314   vnl_vector< double > gwc(3);
00315 
00316   for ( unsigned int k=0; k < imageSize[3]; k++ )
00317   {
00318     g(0) = gValues[0][k]; g(1) = gValues[1][k]; g(2) = gValues[2][k];
00319     gwc = nrrdDir * g;
00320     gValues[0][k] = gwc(0); gValues[1][k] = gwc(1); gValues[2][k] = gwc(2);
00321   }
00322 
00323   fprintf( fw, "DWMRI_b-value:= %d\n",bValues[bValues.size()-1]);
00324 
00325   for ( unsigned int k=0; k < imageSize[3]; k++)
00326   {
00327     if ( lpsSwitchArg.isSet() )
00328       fprintf( fw, "DWMRI_gradient_%.4d:= %.14lf %.14lf %.14lf\n",k,-gValues[0][k],-gValues[1][k],gValues[2][k]);
00329     else
00330       fprintf( fw, "DWMRI_gradient_%.4d:= %.14lf %.14lf %.14lf\n",k,gValues[0][k],gValues[1][k],gValues[2][k]);
00331   }
00332 
00333   fclose (fw);
00334 
00335 
00336   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00337   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00338 
00339 
00340   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00341 }
